external_games.name: At the Heart of the Forest

name: At the Heart of the Forest
summary: Ami is the stubborn little sister discontent with her weaknesses. She journeys into a forest of spirits where she seeks a fabled power. Explore a whimsical but mysterious land isolated from the world, where one’s resolve and heart is tested.
